BR_text.BRsummary: Why does the README not suggest to pass lm and trie files?
BR_text.BRdescription:
From the README:
 
 deepspeech models/output_graph.pb models/alphabet.txt my_audio_file.wav
 
 Why does this not suggest to also pass models/lm.binary and models/trie?
 I get much better accuracry when those are passed, compare:
 <denchmark-code>tearest creature in creation stydy englich pronunciation i wul teacher in my verse sounds like corps cor hors and worse
 </denchmark-code>
 
 to
 <denchmark-code>dearest creature in creation study english pronunciation i will teach you in my verse sounds like corps core horse and worse
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Putting the files into the README instructions might make for a much better first impression when people try DeepSpeech.

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nh2>@nh2</denchmark-link>
  Patches are welcome, it's likely that we are used to doing so, and the command line documents it, so we forgot to update the README on that specific point.

comments_1.comment_text: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
